title: Verbose mode raises exception
body:
Apparently passing -v causes an exception (using 66c275f):

```
$ b sidekiq -q medium,2,high,4,low,1 -e development -c 1 -v
undefined local variable or method `set_logger_level_to_debug' for #<Sidekiq::CLI:0x007fd242b06d98>
/Users/andre/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.3-p0/bundler/gems/sidekiq-66c275f42f70/lib/sidekiq/cli.rb:118:in `block (2 levels) in parse_options'
/Users/andre/.rvm/rubies/ruby-1.9.3-p0/lib/ruby/1.9.1/optparse.rb:1391:in `call'
/Users/andre/.rvm/rubies/ruby-1.9.3-p0/lib/ruby/1.9.1/optparse.rb:1391:in `block in parse_in_order'
/Users/andre/.rvm/rubies/ruby-1.9.3-p0/lib/ruby/1.9.1/optparse.rb:1347:in `catch'
/Users/andre/.rvm/rubies/ruby-1.9.3-p0/lib/ruby/1.9.1/optparse.rb:1347:in `parse_in_order'
/Users/andre/.rvm/rubies/ruby-1.9.3-p0/lib/ruby/1.9.1/optparse.rb:1341:in `order!'
/Users/andre/.rvm/rubies/ruby-1.9.3-p0/lib/ruby/1.9.1/optparse.rb:1432:in `permute!'
/Users/andre/.rvm/rubies/ruby-1.9.3-p0/lib/ruby/1.9.1/optparse.rb:1453:in `parse!'
/Users/andre/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.3-p0/bundler/gems/sidekiq-66c275f42f70/lib/sidekiq/cli.rb:151:in `parse_options'
/Users/andre/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.3-p0/bundler/gems/sidekiq-66c275f42f70/lib/sidekiq/cli.rb:42:in `parse'
/Users/andre/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.3-p0/bundler/gems/sidekiq-66c275f42f70/bin/sidekiq:14:in `<top (required)>'
/Users/andre/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.3-p0/bin/sidekiq:19:in `load'
/Users/andre/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.3-p0/bin/sidekiq:19:in `<main>'
```
